Name: ArbyG
Text: These files can be demanding. This one wants two DIFFERENT bits! The gall...

Name: BLIP
Text: All good with me! This is great fun!

Name: ArbyG
Text: Oh... I wish I could work with you...

Name: ArbyG
Text: Well... isn't it obvious? I'm the manager. I can't build machines and move dirty bits around...

Name: BLIP
Text: Okay... I guess I'll just work alone...
